body.name: Music Note Cards (Stationery, Boxed Cards)

Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 20 hrs
body.description: Distinctive note cards are a pleasure to use Versatile design is suitable for a variety of occasions Perfect for musical friends and family members music directors, music teachers, musical events, and more. Exceptional value Premium boxed set features crisp note cards of substantial stock and stationery envelopes constructed of quality paper. Note card set comes in an attractive box suitable for gift-giving. Brighten their day Keep in touch with a personal note you'll love to send!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: When only a personal note will do... Delight your contacts with a distinctive card!

Premium boxed stationery set comes with 14 note cards and 15 envelopes Nice details Simple but elegant design features one musical note, accompanied by the words ''This note's for you...'' Gloss black highlights and raised embossing add shine and dimension. The keyboard-style border along the bottom shows whether card is open or closed. Superior card stock Inside, you'll find a smooth-finish writing surface -- no smudging or streaking. Quality card stock takes pen beautifully. The interior of the card is blank to accommodate your personal message. Matching envelopes included Classic white stationery envelopes. The keyboard design is replicated on the envelope flaps. Envelopes are constructed of quality paper. We include 15 envelopes...because no one is perfect.

Distinctive note cards are a pleasure to use Versatile design is suitable for a variety of occasions Perfect for musical friends and family members music directors, music teachers, musical events, and more. Exceptional value Premium boxed set features crisp note cards of substantial stock and stationery envelopes constructed of quality paper. Note card set comes in an attractive box suitable for gift-giving. Brighten their day Keep in touch with a personal note you'll love to send! About our Music Note Card: Set comes with 14 folded note cards with blank interiors 15 matching stationery envelopes Cards measure 5'' wide x 3-1/2'' high Stationery set comes in a matching box with a clear acetate lid
Quill Pen and Ink Note Cards Happy Birthday Note Cards Tree of Life Note Cards Sympathy Note Cards Hedgehog Note Cards Hummingbird Flight Note Card

Our Company History In 1928, at the age of twenty-two, Peter Beilenson began printing books on a small press in the basement of his parents’ home in Larchmont, New York. Peter -- and later, his wife, Edna -- sought to create fine books that sold at prices even a pauper could afford. Today, still family owned and operated, Peter Pauper Press continues to honor our founders’ legacy -- and our customers’ expectations -- of beauty, quality, and value. Image: Peter Pauper Press headquarters, circa 1948.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feeding my letter writing habit with these cute note cards.
reviews.reviewText: I give these 5 stars but only 2 stars showed. I beleive I fixed it; just in case I didn't I would mention the deserve 5 stars. This is why I gave them such a high rating: These are cute cards and come with a matching themed envelope. A very good price for a good quality card the design is nice, crisp and clear.I am old fashioned and enjoy writing letters this is an affordable way for me to continue my support of the United States Postal system instead of writing on plain notebook paper or going to the store for a card all the time. Which is what I was doing and that gets expensive. I will buy these again.I already used one and it was nice and smooth to write on. I placed the rest in my statinary drawer with a lavender sachet. My note cards will look good and smell good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Got 5 of these note packs for other members of the choir!
reviews.reviewText: Such an adorable idea. And, play on words. "NOTE" pad with a keyboard. Awesome product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice stationery
reviews.reviewText: These cards are a much higher quality than I expected. I searched online for a decent music- or piano-themed stationery, and I settled on this one mostly because it was affordable. Then I saw the attached note, and I understood why the quality was finer than I expected. They also come in a nice box with the keyboard printed around the edges.I could do without the cheesy pun on the front, personally. But it was preferable to the incomprehensible music printed on some other cards, and also preferable to the prohibitive price of some other nice music stationery I saw. I would love the keyboard underlay with a Bach autograph on the overlay; I saw some Bach autograph stationery, but it was otherwise boring. I also saw elsewhere some envelopes lined with music printed on fine paper, but it wasn't Bach, and it was $35 for 10 cards. I guess you can't have everything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable note cards
reviews.reviewText: These cards are not only clever, they’re great quality as well. Both in the heaviness of the paper & even the cards are decorated too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hits All The Right Keys For A Musical Thank You Card!
reviews.reviewText: Really well made, arrives quickly, and hits all the right keys in a design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality Note Cards!
reviews.reviewText: These note cards are FANTASTIC! Decorated, but not overly. Perfect for any musician in your life! The paper is great quality and thick so you do not need to worry about ink transfer or bleed through. I wrote on the inside cover in Sharpie marker and it did not bleed through to the front of the card. 10/10, would DEFINITELY recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice cards!
reviews.reviewText: These cards are printed on a nice stock, the printed have a slight raised feel like quality embossing. The envelopes have a matching musical keyboard motif which completes the set. They are great all purpose notes from a musician or music lover. As a musician, I frequently send thank you notes or encouragement notes and these are perfect for that purpose! I will likely buy more in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2021
reviews.reviewText: As a pianist, these were just the note cards I wanted. Perfect size, excellent envelopes, sturdy and yet sweet for all occasions. Will reorder when I run out. Thank you! Five star product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 4, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I teach singing so bought these to give to students for encouragement or praise . Lovely little note cards . The envelope also has a matching keyboard image which I thought was a lovely touch. Very pleased with them .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 24, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Great. Cards and so nice presented
These are quite nice. Happy with them.
The envelopes came with faint black marks from the cards design. Not a deal breaker, and only obvious to me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 18, 2015
reviews.reviewText: Really lovely cards in every way, especially where the sender and/or recipient love music. Good design, good texture to write on, envelopes seal well. People to whom I've sent them have commented very favourably.I have bought four boxes since early July and I'll be back for more.
